childMarkdownRemark.html: Worry less about security, caching, and talking to the server. Static sites are the new thing.
Your very first content with Contentful, pulled in JSON format using the Content Delivery API.
Webhooks notify you, another person or system when resources have changed by calling a given HTTP endpoint.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
Acting efficiently and effectively to help visitors to your facilities is essential, no matter who they may be.  Digital assistants like Cassie offer a means of support for visitors without distracting or occupying busy professionals with frequently asked questions, ensuring that those members of staff are more available when they are directly needed.

Cassie seamlessly and precisely connects people to the information they need and shares those conversations back to you as actionable insights, supporting your desire to maximise your service proposition.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
When your first responsibility is the care of patients, acting efficiently to help patients and those who accompany them is essential.  Digital assistants like Cassie offer a means of support for visitors without distracting or occupying busy healthcare professionals with frequently asked questions, ensuring that those members of staff are more available when they are directly needed.

Cassie seamlessly and precisely connects people to the information they need and shares those conversations back to you as actionable insights, supporting your desire to maximise your service proposition.

sectionContent.sectionContent: The sports, leisure and entertainment industries are dedicated to making patrons feel good. Understanding your customers will bring you a key in delivering great service.

childMarkdownRemark.html: The sports, leisure and entertainment industries are dedicated to making patrons feel good. Understanding your customers will bring you a key in delivering great service.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
When your first responsibility is to be *part of the journey*, attending to your passengers' needs efficiently acts to reassure visitors that they are in safe hands.  As they transit through your venue, offering tireless customer service agents, available 24/7 with a health of information and speaking tens of language, you can be confident that your part of their itinary will be smooth and enjoyable.

Cassie seamlessly and precisely connects people to the information they need and shares those conversations back to you as actionable insights, supporting your desire to maximise your value proposition.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
The hospitality industry, more than any other, brings people together.  Whether your business works to make patrons feel at home, or if your venue works to make a visit an event, understanding your customers is key to delivering good service.

Travellers and diners demand service to operate without revealing the seams and operators are largely expected to anticipate the preferences of each customer or party.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
The hospitality industry, more than any other, brings people together. Whether your business works to make patrons feel at home, or if your venue works to make a visit an event, understanding your customers is key to delivering good service.

Travellers and diners demand service to operate without revealing the seams and operators are largely expected to anticipate the preferences of each customer or party.

sectionContent.sectionContent:
Bricks and mortar retail stores have much to offer that cannot be replicated by an online experience.  Customers enjoy seeing and touching goods, and soak in the atmosphere of the stores and shopping environment. Shopping in physical stores is pleasurable and social, an event that reaches past simple product acquisition.  And they customer gets to take their purchases home with them without waiting in for a future delivery.

Web-based shopping has brought the customer new conveniences, such as stock and price checking, product comparisons and recommendations.  Cassie brings these advantages to customers of the high street retail, as well as informing store managers of the engagement patterns that did or did not result in a sale.  This critical data can be exploited to maximise a store's value proposition and provide actionable insights to boost loyalty, spend, revenue and profitability.

shortBio.shortBio: Research and recommendations for modern stack websites.

cassieDescription.cassieDescription:
Cassie is a life-sized digital customer service agent.
Distributed throughout your venue as large touch-screen stations, Cassie converses in natural languages, listening and replying as speech, text and sign languages.
Understand and serve your visitors and customers with a life-sized, conversational customer service agent and personal shopper.
To optimise your customer experience, we must learn what visitors and customers really want.  Cassie's natural language interface offers visitors an entirely new engagement channel, enabling more customers to interact with your business, in whichever way they prefer.  Seamlessly bridging online and physical presence experiences, Cassie is inviting and uniquely attracts people, drawing them in.

Distributed throughout your venue as large touch-screen stations, Cassie converses in natural languages, listening and replying as speech, text and sign languages. Understand and serve your visitors and customers with a life-sized, conversational customer service agent and personal shopper. To optimise your customer experience, we must learn what visitors and customers really want. Cassie's natural language interface offers visitors an entirely new engagement channel, enabling more customers to interact with your business, in whichever way they prefer. Seamlessly bridging online and physical presence experiences, Cassie is inviting and uniquely attracts people, drawing them in.

whoIsCassie.whoIsCassie: Cassie was born to help.  Her first job was to listen on behalf of deaf children and turn spoken words into visual sign languages, such as Cued Speech and British Sign Language.  As she grew a little older, she discovered a love of language and worked as an interpreter at airports and hospitals.  But what Cassie really enjoys is helping people.  With an encyclopaedic knowledge and the will to serve, Cassie will tirelessly support your customers.
